monitoring_results.label: duplicate_br
monitoring_results.description: A single value for a given external ID scheme (e.g. DOI value) is associated with more than one BR.

monitoring_results.label: multiple_id_values
monitoring_results.description: BRs have 2 or more values for at least one of their supported ID schemes (e.g. 2 DOIs for a single journal article).

monitoring_results.label: duplicate_agent
monitoring_results.description: Multiple foaf:Agent entities have the same ID value for any given scheme (e.g. different authors have the same ORCID).

monitoring_results.label: multiple_manifestations
monitoring_results.description: There are BRs that are embodied in multiple fabio:Manifestation entities.

monitoring_results.label: br_in_multiple_venues
monitoring_results.description: There are BRs that (wrongly) appear to be contained in different venues (e.g. journals).
